name: Butcher Hill
description: Butcher Hill is an action game developed and published by Gremlin Graphics in 1989. In this game, the player controls a team of 5 soldiers who have to survive in the jungle and kill as many enemies as possible. In the first part, the player’s team is in a boat on a river with lots of rocks, mines and enemy fighters trying to sink it. If there is at least one remaining soldier at the end of the first part, the player enters the second part, a simulated 3D view of the jungle, shooting enemy soldiers and evading mines.
